events.text:
What's your deal anyway?
You must not be used to having neighbours out here, huh?
Not very friendly but I guess us Drifters are used to that.

events.question: How long have you been living out here?

events.text:
I can tell. Y'all have a lot of trash out here.
Surprisingly you don't have much to say, though.
Pretty rare for someone of your age to not have much to say...
You think we're stupid or something??
Where is this hostility coming from? You're no fun, y'know?
Look, I get it: "putting yourself out there" can be embarrassing... but you should try it some time.

events.question: [wave amp 50.0 connected=1]Hahahaha![/wave] I bet you think I sound like your parents!!!!

events.text:
Hm? I guess it was a jerk move to assume.
I guess you've figured that they left you here or something.
That's the only reason we moved in on this campsite because we saw them both leave in such a hurry.

I was about to ask you that! When I saw you approach, it scared the crap outta me!
I guess you've figured that they left you here or something.
That's the only reason we moved in on this campsite because we saw them both leave in such a hurry.

events.question:
Sooooooo.....
Is it cool if we hang out here overnight?

events.text:
A kid called "Niki", you say?
Oh, right. I remember. The kid with the weird alien lookin' cow by his side.
Matter of fact, I didn't see him. 
I just saw the two adults jet the hell out of here in their camper like the Grim Reaper was hot on their tail.
Something strange is going on...

We'll be gone in the morning. I'll shake on that.
Jeez... I feel bad for you now, kid.
If the other Drifters hear or see anything, we'll be sure to tell you.
Something strange is going on...
